text: Richard Flint (14 November 1899 - 24 September 1982) was a Canadian diver. He competed in three events at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1899 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Canadian male divers Category:Olympic divers of Canada Category:Divers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Toronto
title: Richard Flint
